content: And just to that, I mean the Romeo acquisition is such a big benefit because you think about this we do supply chain together, we do engineering together, we do manufacturing together so we have line of sight of several cost reductions in the most prominent one was the one Kim was highlighting but I mean strategically is such a big benefit having such an important component as a battery in house and we integrate every function, right, And therefore we see good line of sight for cost reduction.
